name: Solitaire．
description:
If you like Windows Solitaire, you're going to love this game! The familiar Windows Solitaire game you used to play on your computer is now available on the AppStore!

Think you have the best Solitaire score around? With Apple's Game Center enabled, you can check the Game Center leaderboards to see how your Solitaire skills stack up against top players all around the world!

Different from other solitaires, we bring you plenty of Winning deals that deals hands guaranteed to have at least one winning solution.

The addicting game you've been playing on your computer for years now goes wherever you do. Solitaire is a universal game, playable in the best resolution available for each Apple device. Download Solitaire today!

FEATURES:
- Theme Packs.
- Winning Deals.
- Game Center leaderboards.
- Draw 1 card.
- Draw 3 cards.
- Portrait.
- Landscape.
- Custom card backs.
- Custom backgrounds.
- Right or left handed play.
- Unlimited undo.
- Auto complete to finish game.
- Standard scoring.
- Statistics.

If you're enjoying Solitaire, please take a few seconds to give us a review! azhuona@gmail.com
